name: The Crystal Spires
description: A breathtaking region where towering crystalline formations pierce the clouds, resonating with raw Aether energy. Once a hub of arcane research, now it glows eerily under perpetual storms of light.

name: The Sunken City
description: Once the heart of civilization, this submerged ruin still hums with old magic. Its submerged spires and floating ruins are haunted by echoes of the lost Aetherians.

name: The Verdant Cradle
description: An enormous, lush island overflowing with life where vines reach the sky and creatures grow impossibly large. Aether has made evolution go wild here.

name: Permorn Caity
description: A desolate wasteland of dark stone and crackling energy. Rumors speak of Aether corruption so deep it warps time itself. Few return from its edge.
